Table description: Reference table containing list of operating division IDs, names, and other relevant data. Filter on ACTIVE_IND = 1 to see current operating divisions
Table=date_dim | Dimention table which contains all the date based data
Table=location_dim | Dimention table which contains all the location based data
This table contains the Merchant Hierarchy from Operating Division down to Division/Department: Operating Division > GMM > PDIV > DIV > MGM > Buyer > Department
